channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.2.0)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.2.0)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.2.0 - 2023-07-26 # Added # Automatic bounds computation in MergeSkinnedMesh #264 Automatic Configuration System #265 Currently FreezeBlendShape can be automatically configured. Support for material swapping animation in MergeSkinnedMesh #274 Changed # Support newly activated avatars in play mode for apply on play #263 Fixed # Breaks mesh without tangent #271 1.
